item.title: Gavin Wood
item.description: About Gavin James Wood is an English computer scientist, a co-founder of Ethereum and creator of Polkadot and Kusama. Articles Polkadot 2023 Roundup (December 2023) YouTube Gavin Wood - Is Polkadot’s OpenGov Democratic? (November 2023) Gavin Wood Sees Polkadot as a Global Supercomputer | Polkadot Decoded 2023 (June 2023) Why This Ethereum Co-Founder Quit? (August 2022) Gavin Wood reveals philosophical errors creating Ethereum, Purpose of Kusama chain, & upbringing (July 2022) Polkadot Founder on Uniting All Crypto Networks for a Web 3.
item.content:encoded:
About

Gavin James Wood is an English computer scientist, a co-founder of Ethereum and creator of Polkadot and Kusama.

Articles

  • Polkadot 2023 Roundup (December 2023)

YouTube

Gavin Wood - Is Polkadot’s OpenGov Democratic? (November 2023)

Gavin Wood Sees Polkadot as a Global Supercomputer | Polkadot Decoded 2023 (June 2023)

Why This Ethereum Co-Founder Quit? (August 2022)

Gavin Wood reveals philosophical errors creating Ethereum, Purpose of Kusama chain, & upbringing (July 2022)

Polkadot Founder on Uniting All Crypto Networks for a Web 3.0 Future (September 2021)

Gavin Wood & Jehan Chu: “The Common Ground of Ethereum and Polkadot” (May 2019)

Web3 Foundation - The Next Evolution of the Internet - Dr. Gavin Wood (October 2017)

Gavin Wood on $60M hack of The DAO (March 2017)

item.title: Blockchain Links
item.description: My Favourite YouTube Channels Altcoin Daily - Bitcoin, Ethereum, Cardano, NFTs, altcoins, metaverse, mining, trading, investing, technology, Web3, & everything crypto related Andreas Antonopoulos - Andreas is one of the most trusted and entertaining educators in the bitcoin industry Cardano Foundation - Cardano Foundation is a blockchain and cryptocurrency organisation based in Zug, Switzerland Charles Hoskinson - co-founder of Ethereum & Cardano blockchain platforms Coin Bureau - go-to informational portal to the Cryptocurrency galaxy DataDash - one-stop shop for all things related to cryptocurrencies and financial markets Lark Davis - Bitcoin, cryptocurrency, and stock investor MMCrypto - learn everything regarding Cryptocurrency and Blockchain related topics Orange Pill - Max Keiser & Stacy Herbert have been creating bitcoin content since 2011 Polkadot - Polkadot is the blockspace ecosystem for boundless innovation Real Vision - arms you with the knowledge, the tools, and the network to succeed on your financial journey The Moon - Bitcoin news and Bitcoin price
item.content:encoded:
My Favourite YouTube Channels

  • Altcoin Daily - Bitcoin, Ethereum, Cardano, NFTs, altcoins, metaverse, mining, trading, investing, technology, Web3, & everything crypto related
  • Andreas Antonopoulos - Andreas is one of the most trusted and entertaining educators in the bitcoin industry
  • Cardano Foundation - Cardano Foundation is a blockchain and cryptocurrency organisation based in Zug, Switzerland
  • Charles Hoskinson - co-founder of Ethereum & Cardano blockchain platforms
  • Coin Bureau - go-to informational portal to the Cryptocurrency galaxy
  • DataDash - one-stop shop for all things related to cryptocurrencies and financial markets
  • Lark Davis - Bitcoin, cryptocurrency, and stock investor
  • MMCrypto - learn everything regarding Cryptocurrency and Blockchain related topics
  • Orange Pill - Max Keiser & Stacy Herbert have been creating bitcoin content since 2011
  • Polkadot - Polkadot is the blockspace ecosystem for boundless innovation
  • Real Vision - arms you with the knowledge, the tools, and the network to succeed on your financial journey
  • The Moon - Bitcoin news and Bitcoin price

item.title: Bitcoin
item.description: About Launched in 2009, Bitcoin is the world’s largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization. Unlike fiat currency, Bitcoin is created, distributed, traded, and stored using a decentralized ledger system known as a blockchain. YouTube Theory of Bitcoin | Introduction (June 2023) Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZ0pwNHAaRfnkaC0752VJdvApWumHvcCV Introduction to Bitcoin: what is bitcoin and why does it matter? (September 2016) Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l1si5ZWLgy0&list=PLPQwGV1aLnTuN6kdNWlElfr2tzigB9Nnj
item.content:encoded:
About

Launched in 2009, Bitcoin is the world’s largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization. Unlike fiat currency, Bitcoin is created, distributed, traded, and stored using a decentralized ledger system known as a blockchain.

YouTube

Theory of Bitcoin | Introduction (June 2023)

  • Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZ0pwNHAaRfnkaC0752VJdvApWumHvcCV

Introduction to Bitcoin: what is bitcoin and why does it matter? (September 2016)

  • Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l1si5ZWLgy0&list=PLPQwGV1aLnTuN6kdNWlElfr2tzigB9Nnj

item.title: Private Keys
item.description: About A private key is a cryptographic variable that is used in conjunction with an algorithm to encrypt and decrypt data. Private keys should be shared only with the key’s generator or parties authorized to decrypt the data. They are crucial in symmetric cryptography, asymmetric cryptography and cryptocurrencies. YouTube How secure is 256 bit security? Can Someone Guess My Crypto Private Key? [From Sand, to Molecules, to the Observable Universe] Could Someone Guess Your Bitcoin Private Key?
item.content:encoded:
About

A private key is a cryptographic variable that is used in conjunction with an algorithm to encrypt and decrypt data. Private keys should be shared only with the key’s generator or parties authorized to decrypt the data. They are crucial in symmetric cryptography, asymmetric cryptography and cryptocurrencies.

YouTube

How secure is 256 bit security?

Can Someone Guess My Crypto Private Key? [From Sand, to Molecules, to the Observable Universe]

Could Someone Guess Your Bitcoin Private Key?

How Public and Private Key Work In Your Crypto Wallets
